name: Yunza
description:
Game based on a peruvian tradition made in 1 and half day for Ceviche Game Jam.

Be follow 2 challenges:

  • Gourmet: The game can be finished in a minute.
  • Ceviche con Mango: At one point during the game, the mechanics suddenly change.

Credits: 

Design: Kay Pacha Team

Programming: Chorri @twitter

Art & Animation: ByeBye-Sama @instagram
